definition: Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

sentences.english: Watch as Marni and Ella try to get him to spill the beans.
sentences.chinese: 观看玛尼和艾拉如何尝试让他说漏嘴的。

sentences.english: Listen to Jason and Marni discuss this long-awaited action movie combination.
sentences.chinese: 请听詹森和玛尼如何讨论这部期待已久的动作片。

sentences.english: Manya and Hela wanted to be especially ravishing that night.
sentences.chinese: 那天晚上玛尼娅和海拉想打扮得特别漂亮。

sentences.english: Learn what Marni and Greta think in this movies English lesson.
sentences.chinese: 在这节电影英语课上，了解玛尼和格里塔的想法。

sentences.english: A twentysomething girl wearing all Armani and looking great.
sentences.chinese: 多岁的女孩，全身阿玛尼，看起来棒极了。

sentences.english: Find out why Mason thinks Marni is crazy for subscribing to magazines.
sentences.chinese: 找出梅森认为玛尼订购杂志是一件荒唐事的原因。

sentences.english: Manya's first kulig was a tremendous experience .
sentences.chinese: 玛尼妞第一次参加“库立格”是一次不平常的经历。

sentences.english: She saw Manya twiddling a young green chestnut leaf under her nose.
sentences.chinese: 她看到玛尼娅在鼻子底下捻弄着一片新绿的栗树叶子。

sentences.english: Rosso, for example, talks about his admiration for Armani.
sentences.chinese: 例如，罗素谈到他崇拜阿玛尼。

sentences.english: I used to go and see him in the office of the Court of Wards in Maniktala.
sentences.chinese: 我常到位于玛尼克塔拉街的沃兹大院的办公室去看他。

sentences.english: Hear Devan talk to Marni about getting friend dumped.
sentences.chinese: 听德凡向玛尼谈论被朋友抛弃。

sentences.english: Marnyi stone is a unique halidom in Tibet.
sentences.chinese: 玛尼石，藏地特有的圣物。

sentences.english: Devan and Marni own a business together.
sentences.chinese: 德凡和玛尼合开了一家公司。

sentences.english: Find out how much party planning Marni and Jason like to do.
sentences.chinese: 看看玛尼和詹森想要做出什么样的聚会策划。

sentences.english: Hear Marni and Ella talk about leftovers.
sentences.chinese: 听听玛尼和艾拉谈论残羹剩饭。

sentences.english: Find out if Marni and Ella are thrill seekers when it comes to travel.
sentences.chinese: 让我们看看玛尼和艾拉在旅游方面是否愿意寻找刺激。

definition: roar or howl of an animal/bellow of rage
the six-syllable Sanskrit mantra of Avalokiteshvara bodhisattva (i.e. om mani padme hum)
(interjection) oh!/(dialect) to stuff sth in one's mouth/(used in buddhist transliterations) om
woman who looks after small children/(old) female tutor
Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)
Pali, language of Theravad Pali canon/Barry (name)/Gareth Barry (1981-), English footballer
Acre, city in Israel, also known as Akko
lama, spiritual teacher in Tibetan Buddhism
